Description:
CONTEMPORARY TOWNHOUSE IDEAL INVESTMENT OR DOWNSIZE OPPORTUNITY
Within easy access to Dower Park and the newly developed Kangaroo Flat Sports Club is this contemporary and surprisingly spacious townhouse. One of four on a spacious allotment, the private home is walking distance to bus stops and all the amenities of Kangaroo Flat including schools, shops, banks and pharmacy.
The front door opens into a very sizable open plan living, kitchen and dining room. This lovely light-filled area offers secure access to the double garage, an oversized space that also includes a neat laundry and workshop area. The galley kitchen in the main living area enjoys good storage and quality appliances.
Off the main entrance and the living room is the master bedroom. A walk-in robe and modern ensuite provide an excellent space and two further bedrooms, both with built-in robes can be accessed off a hallway. This area also includes a family bathroom and separate toilet.
Glass sliding doors from the dining area lead up to sunny courtyard with built-in seating and plenty of space for a BBQ and dining area. The courtyard can also be accessed via a door from the garage. A low maintenance yard leads around the rear and side of the fully detached home.
Additional features include:
Split system heating and cooling
Modern kitchen appliances including four-burner gas cooktop, oven and dishwasher
Good storage throughout
Secure access from double garage to living area
Extended garage with designated laundry and workshop space
Low-maintenance yard
With existing tenants currently residing in this beautifully presented property, there is an excellent opportunity for an investor to secure a quality rental with a very reasonable return. Alternatively, this is an ideal home for a downsizer looking to live in an easy-care home close to all amenities.
Insights: 3/44 Neil Street, Kangaroo Flat VIC 3555 was last sold in 2019 and 137 other 3 bedroom house in Kangaroo Flat have recently been sold.

Description:
Finish me off and love me
Sited on (approx.) 1150m2
of land, is this perfectly-located weatherboard home.
With renovations started but not completed, it is all ready for someone to take it on and benefit from.
2 bedrooms, separate lounge/meals area, new unfinished kitchen with new stove, plus 3 piece bathroom, laundry and toilet.
Outside is a huge run-down shed.
Across from school and minutes to Kangaroo Flat shops and supermarket.
-Huge block, minutes to K/Flat shops
-Unfinished with many materials and appliances to stay
-Walking tracks to amenities
-Public transport / train station just minutes away

Description:
SPACIOUS, AFFORDABLE HOME IN A SOUGHT AFTER LOCALE
This three bedroom, two bathroom family home offers an ideal lifestyle in a brilliant location close to Kangaroo Flat shops, walking tracks and parklands.
An outstanding and affordable opportunity to establish yourself in a sought-after pocket whilst delivering exactly what the family needs. A generously proportioned open plan kitchen/dining/living area opens up onto the undercover alfresco area. The kitchen offers loads of storage, island bench, dishwasher and stainless steel appliances. A second living area offers a multitude of purposes such as office, rumpus room or formal living.
Other features include split system heating and cooling, double garage with internal access and a large, secure backyard.
With scope to grow in value over time, this is a perfect opportunity for astute owner occupiers or investors.
Internal area
168m²

Description:
Stylish Living
When sitting in the main living area of this home it has a beautiful view. Its quite elevated and one can see as far as the CBD of Bendigo. In the evening the street and house lighting is just a picture and something to look forward to every night. The front yard is close to maintenance-free and very neat. The rear yard slopes away and is full of native shrubs and minimal maintenance. The kitchen is stunning in design and function. Carefully chosen colour schemes accentuate the white marble benchtops. WI Pantry, dishwasher, double sink, designer gas stove and oven.
The main bedroom is situated at the front of the house is very large and has a special feature with an open en-suite and a generous WI robe & sep toilet. The remaining two bedrooms are at the rear. The second bedroom is quite large & features a WIR. The third bedroom is standard in size & has a built-in robe. The main bathroom is in close proximity to the bedrooms. All windows floor coverings and window furnishings appear as new. The main feature in the living area is the floor to ceiling glass windows which lends itself to contemporary living.
The garage also has a rear roller door giving one that rear access for an extra car, boat, trailer or caravan. The undercover patio provides plenty of room for entertaining on those lovely balmy summer nights. A lot of thought and meticulous planning has gone into the whole design that sets this stunning home apart. Situated in a sought after area & walking distance to Lansell Square Shopping Centre this home is sure to impress the most discerning of buyers.
Contact:
Rod Jones 0428 444 882
Kim Lawford 0413 825 470

Description:
Move up in the world!
Take your life to a higher level in this lovely elevated property located at the end of a quiet court.
The immaculate brick veneer home oozes an easy living, relaxed style.
Featuring three bedrooms, (main with ensuite and walk-in-robe), separate lounge and spacious open-plan kitchen, dining and family areas opening to a fabulous outdoor living zone.
The kitchen features stainless steel, gas/electric appliances and corner pantry and peninsula bench for casual meals.
Creature comforts include ducted heating and cooling systems complimented by ceiling fans throughout.
Outside, enjoy long, lazy alfresco dining under the shade sails with family and friends while taking in far-reaching views over the district.
The roomy allotment, (approx 858m²) includes a bitumen driveway to a double garage with direct access to the laundry, a garden shed, conversation/fire pit, secure Colorbond fencing and low maintenance landscaping.
It's quietly situated close to Crusoe Heights Reserve off-leash dog park where you can let the kids and dogs run free, kick a footy, fly a kite or walk and ride the adjoining bush trails to Crusoe Reservoir for fishing and water play.

Description:
Luxuriously Spacious, High Quality Home
Peacefully situated in an established street, surrounded by quality residences, this quality custom built family home successfully delivers an idyllic blend of easy low maintenance living with spectacularly large light-filled living zones and luxury extra's throughout.
You'll love the grand entrance with beautifully detailed ceilings and feature tiles that line the extra-wide hallway.
Bedroom accommodation comprises of a master suite of grand proportions, complete with a dual entrance walk-in robe and a huge ensuite. The ensuite comes with double vanities a bathtub, shower and a separate WC.
While the remaining two bedrooms are also larger than usual and come with double built-in robes. There's also a good-sized study/office which could certainly be the 4th bedroom.
The second bathroom comes with a luxurious spa bath, shower and a separate WC with second sink/powder room which is perfect for when having guests over as it's accessible from the living and games rooms.
In total there's 3 generously sized living spaces plus a dining area. They're thoughtfully zoned with entertaining, relaxation and family functionality in mind.
The equally functional kitchen has been fitted with high-quality appliances including an electric stove, a large oven and a dishwasher. The extra-long breakfast island will give so the chef of the family so much room for meal preparation.
Leading from the dining area you'll step outside to the expansive undercover alfresco entertaining area, complete with a tiled floor, ceiling fan and overlooking the stunning lush green grass and landscaping of the backyard.
Extras include gas ducted heating, evaporative ducted cooling, quality blinds, full laundry with external access, double remote garage with internal access, side access, double roller-door concreted and powered shed.
Nothing has been missed in this phenomenal residence, so simply move in and enjoy!

Description:
Solid Family Home UNDER OFFER
The phone enquiry code for this property is - 1028
This sturdy besser block 4 bedroom family home situated on 694m2 in a quiet neighbourhood is perfect for a growing family.
10 minutes walk to schools and new Kangaroo Flat swimming pool, this property ticks a lot of boxes for those wanting space both inside and out, the back yard has established garden beds as well as some clear canvas ready for you to put your own personal touches to it.
Comprising of four bedrooms all with built in robes, main bedroom with ensuite and separate toilet. Open plan kitchen and dining areas with access to undercover, alfresco dining.
Inside Features:
> Large main bedroom with built in robe and ensuite
> 3 other bedrooms with built-in robes
> Main bathroom with bath, shower and vanity
> Separate toilet through the laundry
> Linen cupboards
> Kitchen with large pantry, electric cook top, wall oven and dishwasher, adjoining open plan dining and living area
> Electric under floor heating
> Wall mounted heating and cooling units
> Slow combustion wood fire
> Instantaneous gas hot water
Outside Features:
> Double garage with auto roller door
> Large paved alfresco entertaining
> Recently updated retaining walls
> Workshop with benches
> Garden Shed
> Built in BBQ
> Low maintenance established gardens
> Recently updated Colorbond fencing
With an abundance of potential, this property would be ideal for a first home buyer, family, retiree or investor. Contact us today to arrange your private inspection.

Description:
Shortcut to Tipperary
With privacy assured by its secluded entrance, prepare for an unquestionably pleasant surprise! In this price range, you come to expect a cosy home that at least needs a thorough cosmetic makeover. But at this address, it's all been done, and in such fine harmony with the many original features of this utterly charming cottage.
Beneath high timber ceilings, 2 in rare Dutch-style, grey-painted dadoes embrace rooms refreshed by a palette of soft green and white. Floating floorboards flow throughout the interior, as does reverse cycle air conditioning, while a wood heater adds warmth and ambience in the dining room.
Sympathetically designed to suit the era in which it was built, the spacious kitchen caters for modern demands with dishwasher and 900mm stove. Topped by timber benches, elegant cabinetry incorporates glass cabinetry, wine racks and pot drawers. However, sitting centre stage is the star of the show, the slow combustion stove aptly highlighted in red, retained for its wealth of character. Bathroom and laundry own timber benches too, along with many more gorgeous gleaming extras. Both bedrooms have a whole wall of built-in robes.
A broad elevated verandah, once the front of the house, is now a beautiful outdoor living area overlooking lofty eucalypts of Tipperary Gully. It looks like a terrific spot for easy bushwalking and a recreation reserve nearby offers a place for picnics plus a playground. Backing onto Railway Street, take the shortcut to Bunnings, Homemaker Centre, Lansell Square or Jumpz Trampoline Park. Handy for commuters, it's close to train station and highway too. The property even has a huge shed with concrete floor, power and 2 large rooms for storage, office or workshop.
Value, quality and convenience must put this home at the top of any savvy buyers list!

Description:
Shortcut to Tipperary
With privacy assured by its secluded entrance, prepare for an unquestionably pleasant surprise! In this price range, you come to expect a cosy home that at least needs a thorough cosmetic makeover. But at this address, it's all been done, and in such fine harmony with the many original features of this utterly charming cottage.
Beneath high timber ceilings, 2 in rare Dutch-style, grey-painted dadoes embrace rooms refreshed by a palette of soft green and white. Floating floorboards flow throughout the interior, as does reverse cycle air conditioning, while a wood heater adds warmth and ambience in the dining room.
Sympathetically designed to suit the era in which it was built, the spacious kitchen caters for modern demands with dishwasher and 900mm stove. Topped by timber benches, elegant cabinetry incorporates glass cabinetry, wine racks and pot drawers. However, sitting centre stage is the star of the show, the slow combustion stove aptly highlighted in red, retained for its wealth of character. Bathroom and laundry own timber benches too, along with many more gorgeous gleaming extras. Both bedrooms have a whole wall of built-in robes.
A broad elevated verandah, once the front of the house, is now a beautiful outdoor living area overlooking lofty eucalypts of Tipperary Gully. It looks like a terrific spot for easy bushwalking and a recreation reserve nearby offers a place for picnics plus a playground. Backing onto Railway Street, take the shortcut to Bunnings, Homemaker Centre, Lansell Square or Jumpz Trampoline Park. Handy for commuters, it's close to train station and highway too. The property even has a huge shed with concrete floor, power and 2 large rooms for storage, office or workshop.
Value, quality and convenience must put this home at the top of any savvy buyers list!

Description:
Ready and Waiting..!
First home buyers, astute investors and farmers retiring into town will want to be quick off the mark to see this property! Just off the beaten track, yet surprisingly close to conveniences, its quiet location will no doubt be a winner too.
A multi-purpose sunroom, gym or rumpus room adds bonus living space to a lounge that has a place for a study zone. Beside an open dining area, the beautifully refurbished kitchen has a super stylish hexagon tiled splashback and contemporary breakfast bar infusing designer flavour. Dishwasher and gas cooktop are always welcome inclusions. Bathroom and laundry have also been modernised, appointed with new cabinetry, tiling and fittings for a new era.
All 3 bedrooms have built-in robes as well as ceiling fans, 2 look terrific with gorgeous feature walls and the main is a great size. Split system heating & cooling and a gas wall heater ensure local temps are kept under control year round.
Alongside lawn edged by a curvaceous landscaped border stands a 6.2 x 6.2 metre shed to accommodate cars and a sunny barbeque area. Well planted garden beds grace the front yard too, framing a further expanse of grass.
It's a 20 minute walk to the shopping precinct and primary school or ride there by bike in 6. Stroll to the train station and botanical gardens in 15 minutes, playground at the end of the street or dog park around the corner. Lansell Square and Bunnings are only 25 minutes away for good incentive to go for longer walk.
Ready and waiting!
Internal area
144m²

Description:
Convenient Living & Beautiful Presentation
For those who are looking for a beautifully presented residence in a popular position and affordable price range, we encourage you to book an inspection as your search may be over.
Comprises two spacious bedrooms with built in robes, open plan kitchen/meals and living area, separate bathroom and laundry facilities, plus a single garage for off-street undercover car parking.
Set amongst beautifully maintained gardens, along with a paved private courtyard area, which is perfect to relax and unwind with a book or beverage.
Multiple heating and cooling options throughout the unit provide year round comfort.
Practical design and tasteful colour schemes and inclusions throughout.
Situated within close proximity to Lansell Square shopping centre, and the Kangaroo Flat Homemaker Centre. Also only a few minutes away youll find medical facilities, recreational/swimming complexes, specialty shops and dining, plus local schools and childcare.
There are many further attributes that will ensure this property will appeal to owner occupiers and investors alike, and the enticing price range will no doubt result in an exceptional level of interest.

Description:
Beautiful Family Home in Quiet Court
Set on an approx 1315m2 allotment, yet only 10 minutes' walk from school and college, is a genuine family oasis. A place where children can feel safe and have space to play freely are priceless and rare commodities, but assets that this address possesses.
Choose living areas to suit your lifestyle, either 2 or 3, depending whether you prefer formal dining. In the lounge, twin bay windows and a vaulted timber ceiling add immense character. In the family-sized kitchen, an easy to clean ceramic cooktop sits alongside a cupboard supplied especially to conceal small appliances. The cook will be pleased to find space for a side-by-side fridge and freezer, plus a new dishwasher.
Built-in robes are found in 3 bedrooms, main has walk-in robe and ensuite. A vast 5 kilowatts of solar power saves energy and your hard earned dollars here. A brand new evaporative cooling system has been installed and is ducted throughout, the same as the gas heating.
Gorgeous gardens incorporate a carnival of colourful cottage flowers, with abundant room for children to play. A cubby and ample lawn lends areas for alternative activities too. The outdoor greenery also supplies exquisite vistas for indoor inhabitants, as well as those in the inviting covered alfresco area. Entirely enclosed, the enormous backyard envelops expansive shedding with concrete flooring and power. A double carport at the front makes daily arrivals and departures fuss-free.
It's such a picturesque country-sized property on the edge of the city that it is certain to be popular!

Description:
Modern home full of charm.
Located in a quiet court surrounded by family homes, this exquisite brick build is sure to impress.
Oozing elegance and style throughout, the home has been constructed with the desire to be functional for a large family while also adding a touch of glamour and creating a high level of comfort.
With magnolias and pear trees to greet you upon arrival, the wide foyer sets the standard with the beautiful, French oak timber flooring and high ceilings.
The functional flow of the home will suit any family and draws you through to the open, light-filled kitchen, dining and living area.
The modern kitchen is an entertainer's delight with Caesarstone benchtops, large breakfast bar with waterfalls on each end, an abundance of cupboard and bench space, quality stainless steel appliances, extra-large fridge nook, and butler's pantry with power points galore, further cupboard and bench space and a home for the wine fridge.
The large dining area overlooks both the main living area and the beautiful outdoor entertaining area.
The grand, master suite vaunts two, large walk-in robes with amazing cabinetry and a lustrous ensuite with double vanity, 900mm shower and separate toilet.
A perfect oasis for the kids, the children's wing features three, great-sized bedrooms with built-in robes, a large library with built-in bookshelves and cabinetry ideal as a rumpus or study area, and the beautifully-appointed main bathroom with oversized, deep bath and separate toilet with personal vanity.
The home also features a separate formal lounge perfect for a parents retreat, a large, practical laundry with oodles of storage, cupboard and bench space.
The outdoor entertaining area will delight with café blinds and fans, a magnificent blue stone retaining wall lined with screening pittosporums, and a wealth of grassed area.
Boasting a wide street frontage, the approx. 880sqm block includes a double garage with additional workshop for further storage, and side access with concrete slab to allow for a trailer, caravan or boat.
Additional features include wide driveway for extra parking, full security system featuring eight cameras and internal visual panel, tinted windows throughout, evaporative cooling and central heating, quality fixtures and fittings, and much more.
Be sure not to miss out on this exclusive, custom-built home and contact Jesse Forbes on 0477 277 600 today.
